humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, only one sentinel lymph node was examined and it was found to be negative for malignancy (0/1). This information aligns with Rules 2, 8, 10, and 11, which state that N0 indicates no positive lymph nodes or no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report indicates that one sentinel lymph node was examined and no malignancy was found (0/1). Therefore, the pathologic N stage is N0.
